body.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Today OSHWA is revoking the certification for the Atmel SAM D10C Breakout Board by San Antonio Technologies, ESPJ, UID ES000022. We are taking this action because the documentation is no longer publicly available and the parties responsible for the hardware have been unresponsive to our requests to republish it. This was brought to our attention by a member of the open source hardware community.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"An effective certification program requires ongoing monitoring of certified hardware, both by OSHWA and by the larger open source hardware community. OSHWA prefers to work with responsible parties to resolve problems with certified hardware and views decertification as a last resort. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We discuss the decertification process in more detail in our ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.oshwa.org/2018/08/05/revoking-certification-for-es000001-motedis-xyz/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"blog post about the first decertification","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":". You can learn more about the certification program on the ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://certification.oshwa.org/process.html"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"certification page","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" and ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://certification.oshwa.org/basics/faq.html"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"certification FAQs","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":".","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
